description: Returns a list of  Fragment objects from the specified stream and timestamp range within the archived data. Listing fragments is eventually consistent. This means that even if the producer receives an acknowledgment that a fragment is persisted, the result might not be returned immediately from a request to ListFragments. However, results are typically available in less than one second.

parameters.name: FragmentSelector
parameters.description: Describes the timestamp range and timestamp origin for the range of fragments to return. The origin of the timestamps to use (Server or Producer). The range of timestamps to return. The starting timestamp in the range of timestamps for which to return fragments. The ending timestamp in the range of timestamps for which to return fragments.

nested_params.name: FragmentSelectorType
nested_params.description: The origin of the timestamps to use (Server or Producer).

nested_params.name: TimestampRange
nested_params.description: The range of timestamps to return.

nested_params.name: StartTimestamp
nested_params.description: The starting timestamp in the range of timestamps for which to return fragments.

nested_params.name: EndTimestamp
nested_params.description: The ending timestamp in the range of timestamps for which to return fragments.

nested_items.name: Fragments
nested_items.description: A list of archived  Fragment objects from the stream that meet the selector criteria. Results are in no specific order, even across pages.

nested_items.name: FragmentNumber
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the fragment. This value monotonically increases based on the ingestion order.

nested_items.name: FragmentSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total fragment size, including information about the fragment and contained media data.

nested_items.name: ProducerTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp from the producer corresponding to the fragment.

nested_items.name: ServerTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp from the Amazon Web Services server corresponding to the fragment.

nested_items.name: FragmentLengthInMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The playback duration or other time value associated with the fragment.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the returned list is truncated, the operation returns this token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
